channel.title: PerezHilton
channel.description: Since 2004, Hollywood's most sassy website has been delivering the juiciest celebrity gossip. The blog is The go-to source for daily happenings in Hollywood. Written by the internet's most notorious gossip columnist, Perez Hilton (Mario Lavandeira).

item.title: Paul Walker Is Back Behind The Wheel In Vehicle 19!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Paul Walker drives with a certain speed and aggressiveness in the brand new Vehicle 19! We wonder where he learned that! Ch-ch-check out the video (above) to see the Fast & Furious star make a run for redemption in this brand new trailer! Don't worry about seeing Vehicles 1-18 first! We're assured you won't be lost! LOLz!
item.content:encoded:
Paul Walker drives with a certain speed and aggressiveness in the brand new Vehicle 19! We wonder where he learned that!

Ch-ch-check out the video (above) to see the Fast & Furious star make a run for redemption in this brand new trailer!

Don't worry about seeing Vehicles 1-18 first! We're assured you won't be lost! LOLz!

item.title: Ryan Gosling Lovers Rejoice! Helpline Created To Help Depressed Fans!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: CALLING ALL DISTRESSED RYAN GOSLING FANS!!! Believe us when we tell you WE KNOW how devastated you are that Ryan is taking a break from acting, but there is support! While the seXXXiest leading man in Hollywood is busy "finding perspective" a hotline, The Gosline, has been founded under Blinkbox to help his army of fans [...]
item.content:encoded:
CALLING ALL DISTRESSED RYAN GOSLING FANS!!!

Believe us when we tell you WE KNOW how devastated you are that Ryan is taking a break from acting, but there is support!

While the seXXXiest leading man in Hollywood is busy "finding perspective" a hotline, The Gosline, has been founded under Blinkbox to help his army of fans get through the movie industry's most tragic temporary loss.

The British online movie streaming company tweeted:

To help console Ryan Gosling fans upset by the news he is taking a break from acting we've set up #TheGosline > twitter.com/blinkbox/statu…

— blinkbox (@blinkbox) March 22, 2013

And yes, there is a message from Ryan when you call!!!

We still have The Place Beyond The Pines and Only God Forgives to oogle at his god-like goodies, but we yearn for his return so much already.

...thank you, Blinkbox. THANK YOU!!!!

P.S. CLICK HERE to see what we're gonna miss about him in GIFs!!

item.title: Liam And Chris Hemsworth's Older Brother Luke Ready To Make His Feature Film Debut!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: The Hemsworth clan is officially a force to be reckoned with in Hollywood! Luke Hemsworth, older brother of Chris and Liam, will be making his feature film debut in John V. Soto's The Reckoning. He will star alongside Jonathan LaPaglia in a murder mystery that begins shooting late April. This wont be his first acting stint, as [...]
item.content:encoded:
The Hemsworth clan is officially a force to be reckoned with in Hollywood!

Luke Hemsworth, older brother of Chris and Liam, will be making his feature film debut in John V. Soto's The Reckoning. He will star alongside Jonathan LaPaglia in a murder mystery that begins shooting late April.

This wont be his first acting stint, as Luke has already been featured in several TV shows such as Last Man Standing and Neighbours, but this will be his first time on the big screen!

How exciting!

It might take him a little while before he catches up with Thor and Gale Hawthorne, but this definitely a step in the right direction!

We're definitely not complaining about another Hemsworth breaking onto the scene, and hopefully this is the beginning of big things to come!

Good luck, Luke!

[Image via WENN.]

item.title: Star Trek Lights Up The London Sky With AMAZING Floating Ad!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Lights dancing across the night sky like they're playing with you, signifying something amazing — no, it's not Russell Crowe's cell phone video! It's the amazing marketing stunt Star Trek: Into Darkness pulled for Earth Hour! Ch-ch-check out the video (above) to see dozens of technicians rig the entire London sky to deliver a message! A little more [...]
item.content:encoded:
Lights dancing across the night sky like they're playing with you, signifying something amazing -- no, it's not Russell Crowe's cell phone video!

It's the amazing marketing stunt Star Trek: Into Darkness pulled for Earth Hour!

Ch-ch-check out the video (above) to see dozens of technicians rig the entire London sky to deliver a message!

A little more complicated than a Starfleet communicator, but message received!

item.title: Ender's Game Gets An Official Poster!! Trailer Release Revealed!!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: We have some FANTASTIC Ender's Game news for all you nerds out there!! (Don't worry, we're nerds too!) First and foremost, did you see the first official Ender's Game poster? If not, you must've scrolled to the story too fast because it's right there (above) for your pleasure!! It's the Battle Room – the zero-gravity training [...]
item.content:encoded:
We have some FANTASTIC Ender's Game news for all you nerds out there!! (Don't worry, we're nerds too!)

First and foremost, did you see the first official Ender's Game poster? If not, you must've scrolled to the story too fast because it's right there (above) for your pleasure!! It's the Battle Room – the zero-gravity training ground where recruits learn to fight aliens!!

The director described it like this:

“This is the high school football field, only it’s in three dimensions. It’s the size of a football field in all directions: up, down, left, right. And the idea is teams jump out from opposite ends of this amazing space and play this amazing game of 3D paintball, almost.”

Sounds fab to us!

SECONDLY, did you hear when we're getting the first trailer?? Right before the new Star Trek! How perfect is that??

This is what Roberto Orci (Star Trek's writer) tweeted about it:

“@fleetadmiralj: @boborci when are we getting a trailer? Star trek?” Yup!

— roberto orci (@boborci) March 25, 2013

That's not too far at all!!

We just hope we get some more awesome posters and screenshots before then! If not, we just might lose our damn minds! LOLz!

[Image via Yahoo! Movies.]

item.title: New Game Of Thrones Promo And Featurette Tells Us The Wait Is Over!!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: If only it were true… we still have to wait until Sunday! Though, maybe they mean that there are no more Sundays (or Mondays) that have to pass before we get to peep some sweetballz dragon action!! We're TOO excited!! First, we're lucky enough that Game of Thrones KNOWS we've been waiting, so they're happy to feed [...]
item.content:encoded:
If only it were true... we still have to wait until Sunday!

Though, maybe they mean that there are no more Sundays (or Mondays) that have to pass before we get to peep some sweetballz dragon action!! We're TOO excited!!

First, we're lucky enough that Game of Thrones KNOWS we've been waiting, so they're happy to feed us little treats in the form of promos (above). Then, they're like, we might as well give 'em a little more... and slap us with a featurette about the Wildlings (below)!

It's even more than 5 minutes long!!

We'll never get rid of this boner now!! Our day is ruined in the BEST possible way! LOLz!!

Ch-ch-check them both out!! We hope you enjoy the promo as much as the featurette ...AFTER THE JUMP!!!

item.title: The Walking Dead Finale Declares All Out War! Watch Two NEW Sneak Peeks Here!!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: The time to fight has come. As Rick (Andrew Lincoln) and the Governor (David Morrissey) prepared for battle on Sunday night's penultimate episode, they and their according camps will FINALLY engage in all out war in the upcoming Season 3 finale of The Walking Dead. Check out Carl reminisce as he packs up his belongings in the [...]
item.content:encoded:
The time to fight has come.

As Rick (Andrew Lincoln) and the Governor (David Morrissey) prepared for battle on Sunday night's penultimate episode, they and their according camps will FINALLY engage in all out war in the upcoming Season 3 finale of The Walking Dead.

Check out Carl reminisce as he packs up his belongings in the clip (above), then take a peek at the EXPLOSIVE sneak peek of the Governor's attack ...AFTER THE JUMP!!!

YIKES!!

The Governor doesn't look like he'll be backing down any time soon! Let's just hope Team Rick knows what they're doing!

item.title: Girls Aloud Get Loud One Last Time! Watch Their FULL Ten Tour Performance HERE!!!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: Girls Aloud calling it quits still feels like a wicked game. Why couldn't their VERY LAST tour EVER last, like, forever LOL! Didn't see the girls??!!! Welp! Thanks to the world wide web, we have their FULL show from their Ten Tour. Yes. It's true!!! We can watch over an HOUR of Girls Aloud bubblegum pop for [...]
item.content:encoded:
Girls Aloud calling it quits still feels like a wicked game.

Why couldn't their VERY LAST tour EVER last, like, forever LOL!

Didn't see the girls??!!!

Welp! Thanks to the world wide web, we have their FULL show from their Ten Tour.

Yes. It's true!!!

We can watch over an HOUR of Girls Aloud bubblegum pop for you to enjoy and play over and over again for the rest of time!!!

Ch-ch-check out one of their FINAL performances (above)!!!

item.title: Rick Ross Encourages Date Rape??!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: This is concerning!!! In a new song by Rick Ross, Future, and Rocko titled You Don't Even Know It (U.O.E.N.O.), there's a VERY worrisome lyrics about taking advantage of a woman. When Rick's verse rolls around, he raps: “Put molly all in her champagne, she ain’t even know it / I took her home and I [...]
item.content:encoded:
This is concerning!!!

In a new song by Rick Ross, Future, and Rocko titled You Don't Even Know It (U.O.E.N.O.), there's a VERY worrisome lyrics about taking advantage of a woman.

When Rick's verse rolls around, he raps:

“Put molly all in her champagne, she ain’t even know it / I took her home and I enjoyed that, she ain’t even know it.”

Ummmmm...excuse us??!

We know Rick likes to stir up controversy with his raps about drug use and guns, but this is TOO far.

Especially with the recent Stuebenville incident, this is BEYOND outrageous.

Ch-ch-check out the rest of the eye-popping song (above)!!!!

Do U think Rick was out of line??!

item.title: Les Misérables Gets Another Brand New Song In This Unforgiving Honest Trailer!
item.dc:creator: Perez Hilton
item.description: We LOVE us some Les Misérables, but if anyone can make us second guess ourselves, it's the people at Honest Trailers! Ch-ch-check out the video (above) to see the brutally honest — but beautifully sung — recut trailer for the Les Mis Blu-Ray release! Guys, if Russell Crowe comes after you, just pretend you're a weather balloon. [...]
item.content:encoded:
We LOVE us some Les Misérables, but if anyone can make us second guess ourselves, it's the people at Honest Trailers!

Ch-ch-check out the video (above) to see the brutally honest -- but beautifully sung -- recut trailer for the Les Mis Blu-Ray release!

Guys, if Russell Crowe comes after you, just pretend you're a weather balloon. Or some swamp gas. Or a low-flying helicopter.
